lines.text:
[with strong French accent]
You, you come with me to pick up Peter.
No, you you come with me to pick up MacIntosh!
No no no no, you you you! and if you don't come I... oh merde alors comment on dit ça...
Comment ça "merde alors"? but alors you are French!
I wonder where are we now?
We must be over Calais sir.

[the clouds clear, then the Eiffel Tower is visible]
Yeah, Calais!
Vous dormirez bien Messieurs. Schlafen Sie gut! Je suis très à cheval sur la literie!

[trying to make herself better understood]
Oui à cheval sur la liter... A cheval... Oui...
MacIntosh, why don't you get back to Canada!
MacIntosh, look at that lovely thing over there.
